backend/main.mo: Primary backend canister implementing land minting logic, data structures, access control, and gameplay mechanics.
CANISTER_REINSTALL_GUIDE.md: Guide for performing a forced full reinstall and re-initialization of Land and Asset canisters with prerequisites and backup steps.
DEPLOYMENT_CHECKLIST.md: Deployment checklist outlining environment configuration steps for preparing the CyberGenesis system.
DEPLOYMENT_GUIDE.md: Mainnet deployment guide detailing prerequisites and the sequence for creating and deploying all canisters and assets.
DEPLOYMENT_INSTRUCTIONS.md: High-level deployment instructions covering critical environment setup and ordered canister deployment.
DEVELOPER_README.md: Developer documentation describing system architecture, canister responsibilities, and inter-canister communication.
ENVIRONMENT_CONFIGURATION.md: Guide listing required frontend environment variables and network configuration settings.
ENVIRONMENT_SETUP.md: Setup guide explaining environment configuration and backend canister deployment for resolving common errors.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting two frontend feature updates with associated files and test references.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of short summaries describing the purpose and behavior of various frontend source files.
frontend/.env: Main production environment configuration containing canister IDs, network settings, and admin authorization.
frontend/.env.example: Template environment file providing required variables and example configurations for local and mainnet use.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry point loading the root application and Vite main script with cache prevention headers.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component handling identity initialization, actor setup, profile loading, and conditional rendering for loading, reinitialization, and authenticated pages.
frontend/src/asset-backend.d.ts: TypeScript definitions for the asset backend canister including assets, user profiles, roles, and all asset‑related API methods.
frontend/src/asset-backend.idl.ts: Candid IDL describing the asset canister’s asset management, admin controls, access control, and user profile endpoints.
frontend/src/backend.idl.ts: Candid IDL defining the main backend service for lands, rewards, modifiers, user roles, HTTP transforms, and game logic operations.
frontend/src/components/AdminGLBUpload.t: Admin‑only GLB model upload tool with health checks, authorization validation, drag‑and‑drop, and upload progress tracking.
frontend/src/components/AdminPanel.tsx: Simple admin panel for GLB uploads including canister health checks, file validation, and simulated upload flow.
frontend/src/components/AssetCanisterDia: Diagnostic tool running multiple tests against the asset canister, logging results, checking permissions, and querying cycle balance and inventory.
frontend/src/components/AssetCanisterRei: Provides an admin-only UI workflow to run pre-checks, reinitialize the asset canister, and perform post-checks with step tracking and status toasts.
frontend/src/components/CanisterDiagnost: Runs connectivity and health tests against land and asset canisters across multiple gateways, generating status reports and recommendations.
frontend/src/components/CanisterIDVerifi: Displays whether environment variables match expected canister IDs and highlights mismatches in a visual card layout.
Validates required environment variables at runtime and shows a fixed error banner with detailed issues and quick-fix instructions if misconfigured.
frontend/src/components/CosmicBackground: Renders a full-screen animated 2D canvas starfield and nebula background with twinkling and pulsing effects for visual ambiance.
frontend/src/components/CubeVisualizatio: Renders a biome‑based 3D scene using three.js, custom shaders, lighting sync, and dynamic background effects.
frontend/src/components/CyberCube.tsx: Empty placeholder file exporting nothing; logic was moved to LandModel.tsx.
frontend/src/components/DeploymentVerifi: Checks health of Land and Asset canisters, displays statuses, and refreshes them periodically with UI feedback.
frontend/src/components/Discovery.tsx: Manages loot cache discovery and processing, handling token costs, land charge requirements, and updating related queries.
frontend/src/components/ErrorBoundary.ts: React error boundary that catches component errors and displays a styled fallback message.
frontend/src/components/Governance.tsx: Implements staking, proposal creation, and voting UI with hooks for token and governance interactions.
frontend/src/components/LandDashboard.ts: Displays land stats, cooldown timers, token actions, modifier usage, and admin debug tools for balances.
Empty file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/components/LandModel.tsx: Loads a GLTF land model with KTX2 textures, applies emissive and environment settings, and auto-fits the camera based on model bounds.
frontend/src/components/LandSelector.tsx: Displays a UI card for browsing lands with previous/next controls and localized biome names.
frontend/src/components/Leaderboard.tsx: Fetches and displays the top 10 lands leaderboard with styled ranking and token balances.
frontend/src/components/MapView.tsx: Renders an interactive world map with drag, pinch, and zoom gestures, centering on the user's land using spring animations.
frontend/src/components/Marketplace.tsx: Provides marketplace UI for browsing, filtering, buying, listing, and canceling land and modifier items.
Empty component file with no implementation.
frontend/src/components/NetworkDiagnosti: Performs periodic network health checks to an asset canister and displays connection status, latency, and uptime.
frontend/src/components/ParticleBackgrou: Canvas-based particle animation with glow effects and resize handling.
frontend/src/components/PlotCustomizatio: UI to edit a land plot’s name and decoration URL with API mutations.
frontend/src/components/PlugWalletButton: Connect/disconnect button for Plug Wallet with dropdown actions.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: Profile creation form that saves a user name via mutation and shows toasts.
frontend/src/components/Reinitialization: Full-screen overlay showing connection retry status and progress bar.
frontend/src/components/ThreeErrorBounda: Error boundary that catches 3D rendering errors and shows a resettable fallback UI.
frontend/src/config/mainnet.ts: Mainnet configuration for canister IDs, URLs, features, and helpers for model URLs.
Provides React context for Plug wallet connection, managing connect/disconnect state and actor creation.
frontend/src/data/modifierCatalog.ts: Defines a static list of placeholder modifier items grouped by rarity tiers.
frontend/src/governance-backend.d.ts: Type definitions for governance backend including proposals, votes, and staking results.
frontend/src/governance-backend.idl.ts: Candid IDL describing governance backend service methods and data structures.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and caches backend actors based on Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorReinitializer: Hook implementing automatic actor reinitialization with gateway rotation and retry logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorWithInit.ts: Hook that initializes an actor and performs repeated connectivity and data checks with backoff.
frontend/src/hooks/useAssetActor.ts: Initializes an asset canister actor with environment validation, gateway health checks, and retry logic. Handles automatic gateway failover and actor creation with timeouts.
frontend/src/hooks/useAssetHealth.ts: Checks the asset canister’s health via a delayed fetch to its /health endpoint. Returns a simple status state for UI use.
frontend/src/hooks/useAssetUpload.ts: Provides a GLB upload function using the Plug wallet agent and an asset canister actor. Tracks upload progress, errors, and returns upload results.
frontend/src/hooks/useGovernanceActor.ts: Builds a governance canister actor with Internet Identity authentication, gateway failover, and retry/timeout logic. Manages actor state, errors, and initialization flow.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity provider and hook using AuthClient for login, identity loading, and session management. Exposes identity, login actions, and status flags to consumers.
frontend/src/hooks/useMarketplaceActor.t: Creates a marketplace canister actor with identity support and gateway failover, using retries and timeouts similar to the governance actor. Manages initialization state and errors.
Provides React Query mutation hooks for executing Plug Wallet transactions against token, marketplace, and governance canisters with error handling and cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Implements data-fetching and mutation hooks for land data, user profiles, token balances, and placeholder governance/marketplace types using Internet Identity actors.
frontend/src/hooks/useTokenActor.ts: Initializes and manages a token canister actor with retry logic, gateway failover, and timeout handling using Internet Identity.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global styles, Tailwind layers, dark theme variables, neon/glassmorphism effects, and custom fonts for the UI.
frontend/src/lib/buildInfo.ts: Generates build version metadata, adds cache-busting parameters to URLs, and logs build info at app startup.
frontend/src/lib/debugConfig.ts: Provides debug utilities for 3D scene logging, performance monitoring, GPU diagnostics, and renderer detection based on debug mode flags.
frontend/src/lib/modelLoader.ts: Empty placeholder module for future model-loading logic.
frontend/src/lib/tokenUtils.ts: Provides helpers for formatting and parsing token amounts with fixed decimals, including separator formatting and balance checks.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/marketplace-backend.d.ts: Type definitions for marketplace canister interfaces, listings, and buy result variants.
frontend/src/marketplace-backend.idl.ts: Candid IDL factory defining marketplace service methods, listing records, and buy result variants.
frontend/src/pages/Collection.tsx: Renders a catalog of modifiers with rarity tiers, counts, and styled visual cards.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Main user dashboard with tab navigation, land data fetching, and conditional rendering of various modules.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Landing screen handling Internet Identity login with animated visuals and error feedback.
frontend/src/pages/MintingPage.tsx: Displays land initialization progress and success messages during minting setup.
frontend/src/pages/VerificationPage.tsx: Page for verifying canister ID configuration with a dedicated verification component.
frontend/src/token-backend.d.ts: Type definitions for token canister ICRC-1 interfaces including transfers, metadata, and admin controls.
frontend/src/token-backend.idl.ts: Defines Candid IDL types and service methods for token balance, transfer, metadata, supply, and minting.
frontend/src/types/webgpu.d.ts: Provides TypeScript type declarations for WebGPU interfaces to enable compile‑time support.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading URL parameters, storing them in sessionStorage, and clearing them from URL or storage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS config defining theming, colors, animations, and plugin setup.
frontend/vite.config.ts: Vite build configuration with React, environment vars, aliases, dev server, and custom asset handling.
project_state.json: Tracks project state, feature requests, issues, and architectural notes.
README_RUSSIAN.md: Russian-language deployment guide with requirements and quick-start instructions for CyberGenesis.
scripts/upload_assets_mainnet.sh: Mainnet uploader script sending .glb assets to the AssetCanister with base64 encoding and rate‑limiting.
scripts/upload_assets.sh: Local script to batch upload tiered .glb model assets to the AssetCanister using dfx.
unknown.txt: Contains a fragment referencing a health‑endpoint test.
